price: Allah takva sahiplerini kurtuluşlarından dolayı necata erdirir. Onlara kötülük dokunmaz ve onlar hüzne kapılmayacaklardır.
arabic: وَيُنَجِّي ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ بِمَفَازَتِهِمۡ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلسُّوٓءُ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayunajjī al-lahu alladhīna ittaqaw bimafāzatihim lā yamassuhumu al-sūu walā hum yaḥzanūna
